PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Modelagem do desempenho separativo de ultracentrнfugas por regressгo polinomial mъltipla
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
O objetivo do presente trabalho й obter um modelo que relacione o desempenho separativo de uma centrнfuga e as variбveis controladas no processo de separaзгo, a saber: pressгo e vazгo das correntes de alimentaзгo, produto e rejeito da centrнfuga. A anбlise por regressгo mъltipla permite conhecer a correlaзгo entre as variбveis controladas e as respostas analisadas. Com esta tйcnica й possнvel realizar simultaneamente a anбlise e propagaзгo dos erros experimentais. Com isso pretende-se chegar a um modelo numйrico que descreva o comportamento separativo da centrнfuga baseado em valores experimentais, onde os erros associados sгo plenamente conhecidos.
Trabalhos anteriores propхem a utilizaзгo de uma tйcnica de modelagem de processos advinda do desenvolvimento da inteligкncia artificial, denominada de redes neurais. No entanto, com esse tipo de tratamento nгo sгo levados em conta os erros experimentais, de forma que todos os resultados sгo utilizados com o mesmo grau de importвncia na geraзгo dos parвmetros do modelo. Num conjunto de dados onde a qualidade ou confiabilidade dos resultados й questionбvel, este procedimento pode carregar erros que afetam o modelo final.

Esse instrumento deverб seguir a mesma descriзгo do estado psicolуgico do indivнduo, demonstrado por Meyer e Allen, autores responsбveis pelo modelo de mensuraзгo do comprometimento organizacional e ocupacional, validado por vбrios pesquisadores entretanto com indicadores diferenciados, ainda nгo encontrados na literatura, os quais poderгo ser capaz de demonstrar a existкncia ou nгo do comprometimento, bem como, o grau deste quando da adoзгo de gestхes organizacionais.
E o segundo o de validar esse instrumento atravйs de sua aplicaзгo em uma instituiзгo pъblica federal de pesquisa, cujo grau de comprometimento organizacional e ocupacional jб foi mensurado e alcanзou elevados graus de comprometimento afetivo e normativo, propiciando dessa forma a possibilidade de mensurar o grau de comprometimento desses empregados em relaзгo а iminente implementaзгo de um Sistema de Gestгo Ambiental por essa Instituiзгo reiteradamente exigido pelo Instituto Brasileiro do Meio Ambiente e dos Recursos Renovбveis ?IBAMA.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:

paralelas. O estudo do comportamento dinвmico das placas paralelas de elementos combustнveis й de grande

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: A comunicaзгo dos riscos na preparaзгo para emergкncias nucleares: um estudo de caso em Angra dos Reis, Rio de Janeiro
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: O propуsito dessa pesquisa й desenvolver um programa eficaz de comunicaзгo dos riscos que possa ser utilizado para a atividade nuclear
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Risk management in a nuclear facility is necessary for the safety of workers and the surrounding population. One part of this process is risk communication that enables dialogue between the company managers and people who live within risk area. People who are aware of the risks to which they are exposed, how these risks are handled and how to behave in an emergency situation tend to feel safer and to trust the institutions responsible for the emergency plan. Without dialogue, the population has no access to the procedures necessary in occurrence of an accident, and even if they do have access, there is no trust in the institution. In Angra dos Reis, on the southern coast of the state of Rio de Janeiro, there is the Almirante Бlvaro Alberto Nuclear Power Plant. In the surroundings of the power plant there is a population that, according to the External Emergency Plan, must be evacuated or sheltered in the occurrence of an accident. Communication with this population is crucial, so that they become aware of the emergency plan and to its procedures, in addition to clarify doubts and myths about the risks they are exposed. This work presents an analysis of risk communication regarding local population surrounding the nuclear power plant in Angra dos Reis, their risk perception and the degree of knowledge of the external emergency plan by this population.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Risk communication in preparation for nuclear emergencies: a case study in Angra dos Reis, Rio de Janeiro

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Desenvolvimento de um elemento combustнvel padrгo instrumentado, tipo placa, para avaliaзгo termo-hidrбulica de nъcleo de reatores de pesquisa
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
O objetivo deste projeto de pesquisa й o desenvolvimento de um elemento combustнvel padrгo instrumentado, tipo placa, para avaliaзгo termo-hidrбulica do resfriamento das placas combustнveis, principalmente das placas laterais, que formam os canais entre elementos adjacentes, e desta forma fornecer informaзхes, nгo disponнveis na literatura, para melhorias no projeto, construзгo e condiзхes de operaзгo de nъcleos de reatores de pesquisa.
Este projeto tem como principal agente motivador a garantia da seguranзa operacional do reator IEA-R1 operando a 5 MW
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES:
After the IEA-R1 upgrade from 2 MW to 5 MW it was observed that the corrosion rate increased in a lateral plate of one fuel element and some issues appeared concerning the flow values used in the thermal-hydraulic analysis. In order to clear it up and measure the actual flow distribution among the fuel elements composing the IEA-R1 active core, a dummy element without nuclear fuel material, called DMPV-01 (Pressure and Flow Measurement Device), full scale, was designed and manufactured in aluminum. The flow rate in the channel between two fuel assemblies is very difficult to estimate or measure. This flow rate is very important to the cooling process of the external plates. This work presents the design and construction of an instrumented fuel assembly in order to measure the actual temperature in these lateral plates. 
	Fourteen thermocouples were installed in this instrumented fuel assembly. Four in each lateral channel, one in the inlet nozzle and one in the outlet nozzle. There are three thermocouples in each channel to measure the clad temperature and one thermocouple to measure the fluid temperature. 
	Three series of experiments, for three different core configuration were carried out with the instrumented fuel assembly. In two experiments a box was installed around the core to reduce the cross flow between the fuel assembly and measure the impact in the temperatures of external plates. 
	Given the amount of information generated and its utility in the design, improvement and qualification in construction, assembly and manufacturing of instrumented fuel, this project turned out to be an important landmark on the thermal-hydraulic study of research reactor cores. The proposed solutions could be useful for other research reactors.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Development of an Instrumented Fuel Assembly for the IEA-R1 Research Reactor

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Modelo com qualidades psicomйtricas para avaliaзгo da cultura de seguranзa em instalaзхes nucleares
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: A operaзгo segura e confiбvel de usinas nucleares nгo depende sу da excelкncia tйcnica do projeto e construзгo, mas tambйm das pessoas e da organizaзгo. Por essa razгo, a importвncia dos fatores organizacionais nos mecanismos causais de acidentes tem sido reconhecida por uma sйrie de organizaзхes de pesquisas na Europa, EUA e Japгo. Deficiкncias nesses fatores revelam fragilidades na cultura de seguranзa da organizaзгo. Uma preocupaзгo bбsica na avaliaзгo de uma cultura de seguranзa й garantir que os instrumentos de pesquisa sejam vбlidos e confiбveis. Nas бreas de saъde e de seguranзa do trabalho hб uma sйrie de instrumentos para avaliar a cultura de seguranзa, para os quais sгo apresentados estudos de suas proporiedades psicomйtricas (confiabilidade e validade), mas muito pouco com essas qualidades na бrea nuclear. No caso especнfico do Brasil, nenhum. Portanto, o principal objetivo deste trabalho foi desenvolver um modelo capaz de avaliar com medidas vбlidas e confiбveis a cultura de seguranзa de instalaзхes nucleares. O instrumento de pesquisa foi desenvolvido com base em princнpios psicomйtricos estabelecidos para pesquisas quantitativas e, portanto, foram realizadas a anбlise da confiabilidade e as validaзхes de conteъdo, de face e de construto. O instrumento foi aplicado nos institutos de pesquisa da Comissгo Nacional de Energia Nuclear (CNEN), obtendo-se um total de 226 questionбrios respondidos. Os resultados da pesquisa possibilitaram caracterizar demograficamente os respondentes e identificar muitos aspectos fortalecidos, mas tambйm algumas fragilidades na cultura de seguranзa dos institutos avaliados. O instrumento apresentou boas evidкncias de confiabilidade com o coeficiente alpha de Cronbach de 0,95 para o instrumento como um todo. A validaзгo de construto foi realizada por meio de uma anбlise fatorial utilizando-se a Anбlise de Componentes Principais (ACP) e rotaзгo fatorial ortogonal Varimax. Os resultados da anбlise fatorial permitiram concluir que o instrumento possui boas evidкncias de validade de construto, mas tambйm sugeriram alguns ajustes no caso de uma nova aplicaзгo do instrumento.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Estudo in vitro da composiзгo e microdureza de tecidos duros da cavidade bucal submetidos a irradiaзгo gama com a dose empregada no tratamento de pacientes acometidos com cвncer de cabeзa e pescoзo
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
O objetivo do presente estudo in vitro й avaliar o efeito da radiaзгo gamma nos tecidos duros da cavidade oral, determinar a microdureza de superfнcie do esmaltedental antes e apуs a irradiaзгo gamma, determinar a microdureza de superfнcie da dentina radicular antes e apуs a irradiaзгo gama e
determinar a microdureza de superfнcie do osso alveolar antes e apуs a irradiaзгo gama.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: This work aims the in vitro study to evaluate the effect of gamma radiation in the hard tissues of the oral cavity , determine the enamel surface microhardness before and after gamma irradiation, to determine the hardness of the surface of the root dentin before and after gamma irradiation and determine the microhardness of the surface of the alveolar bone before and after gamma irradiation .

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Instrumentaзгo especial para avaliaзгo de potкncia total de decaimento liberada por componentes de sistemas nucleares
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
A taxa de liberaзгo de energia apуs o desligamento de um reator nuclear й importante na
definiзгo dos requisitos dos sistemas de resfriamento e na previsгo das consequкncias de
acidentes postulados. Neste texto й proposta a fabricaзгo de um calorнmetro dedicado а
mediзгo da potкncia de decaimento total liberada por elementos combustнveis e amostras
irradiadas no reator IEA-R1, que й operado pelo Instituto de Pesquisas Energйticas e
Nucleares (IPEN/CNEN-SP). Serгo aplicados mйtodos da calorimetria. Os principais desafios
tйcnicos previstos no projeto sгo aqueles associados а mediзгo de potкncias relativamente
baixas em volumes de controle relativamente grandes (nas fronteiras do calorнmetro й
esperado fluxo de calor inferior a 0,1W/cm2). Alйm disso, o arranjo experimental precisa
garantir a remoзгo do calor de decaimento das amostras, em todas as etapas dos
experimentos. O projeto proposto tem como meta primбria a obtenзгo de dados experimentais
com incerteza nгo superior a 10% para potкncias de decaimento entre 10W e 200W. O projeto
tem duraзгo prevista de 24 meses.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES:
Heat release rate after nuclear reactor shutdown is important matter for determining cooling
requirements as well as for predicting postulated accident consequences. The research herein
proposed aims at manufacturing a calorimeter dedicated to the measurement of total decay
heat released from fuel assemblies and samples irradiated at the IEA-R1 reactor, which is
operated by the Instituto de Pesquisas Energйticas e Nucleares (IPEN/CNEN-SP).
Calorimetry methods will be applied. Technical challenges are foreseen, particularly
regarding the measurement of relatively small amounts of heat released over a large boundary
surface (heat flux below 0.1W/cm2 must be accurately measured). Experiments must also be
performed in a way that ensures removal of the decay heat released from samples. Primary
target is set at obtaining experimental data with uncertainties not greater than 10% for decay
heat in the range 10W-200W. Project deadline is set at 24-month time after approval.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Special instrumentation for evaluation of total decay power released from nuclear systems components

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Estabelecimento de Padrхes Experimentais no Reator IPEN/MB-01 Visando Validaзгo de Metodologia de Cбlculo e de Bibliotecas de Dados Nucleares para a Бrea de Fнsica de Reatores
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Nos processos de validaзгo e verificaзгo de metodologias de cбlculo e bibliotecas de dados nucleares associados, a existкncia de experimentos que possam ser considerados padrхes de comparaзгo (benchmarks) й de fundamental importвncia. Nesse aspecto, o reator IPEN/MB-01 pode dar uma contribuiзгo fundamental pelo fato de ser um sistema de caracterнsticas e de composiзхes bem estabelecidas. Esse projeto de pesquisa pretende dar uma contribuiзгo а бrea de Fнsica de Reatores na elaboraзгo de padrхes experimentais nesse reator. Os parвmetros fнsicos selecionados sгo aqueles que necessitam de melhor respaldo experimental de qualidade, como os relacionados aos nкutrons atrasados e na variaзгo espacial da auto-blindagem de ressonвncias do 238U e 235U no interior da pastilha combustнvel. Alйm disso, parвmetros importantes relacionados а seguranзa contra a criticalidade nuclear serгo avaliados por meio da elaboraзгo de vбrias configuraзхes crнticas de interesse para o ICSBEP (International Criticality Safety Benchmark Evaluation Project). O Brasil foi recentemente convidado a participar desse projeto e jб contribuiu com cinco configuraзхes. Para obtenзгo das abundвncias relativas e constantes de decaimento de nкutrons atrasados serб utilizado o modelo de reator refletido de Cohn para a anбlise dos resultados dos experimentos de tйcnica de ruнdo neutrфnico e de mъltiplos transientes. Serб realizado o experimento de resposta de detectores out-of-core no sentido de fornecer subsнdios para validaзгo de metodologias utilizadas no posicionamento desses detectores. As bibliotecas de dados nucleares consideradas para anбlise serгo a ENDF/B-VI.8, a JENDL-3.3 e a JEFF-3.0. Visando a modernizaзгo do sistema de controle do reator IPEN/MB-01 serб desenvolvido um canal de pulsos digital para utilizaзгo futura na mesa de operaзгo do reator..

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Mйtodo de especificaзгo e projeto aplicado a usinas nucleares mуveis
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: A importвncia de mйtodos de projeto vem crescendo nos ъltimos anos а medida que sistemas sуcio-tйcnicos complexos se tornam mais numerosos. Alйm da complexidade, o tamanho e o investimento financeiro destes sistemas amplificam a gravidade dos erros de projeto. O objetivo geral deste trabalho foi desenvolver um mйtodo de especificaзгo e projeto que reduza o tempo e energia para desenvolver um sistema complexo cujas funзхes sejam conhecidas a priori, gerenciando em paralelo os riscos. O objetivo especнfico foi verificar a viabilidade econфmica de usinas nucleares mуveis de pequeno porte. Este trabalho adotou como princнpio a lei construtal que prevк o sucesso de sistemas que facilitem os fluxos necessбrios а sua existкncia. Apуs a identificaзгo dos fatores chave para facilitar o fluxo de informaзхes, esta tese desenvolveu um conjunto de conceitos para facilitar o trabalho de engenharia. Aplicando tais conceitos, este trabalho desenvolveu sequкncias de atividades que descrevem o mйtodo proposto, sendo cada atividade detalhada por uma lista de requisitos. A demonstraзгo das vantagens do mйtodo proposto foi feita por meio de anбlise de бrvore de eventos e бrvore de falhas. Usando o mйtodo, esta tese desenvolveu especificaзхes e projetos em vбrios nнveis (empresarial, usina, caldeira nuclear, circuito primбrio e gerador de vapor). Baseando-se em dados da marinha americana, esta tese desenvolveu um modelo de custo para reatores de pequeno porte. Concluiu que a energia nuclear pode ser competitiva se a potкncia elйtrica mйdia efetiva ao longo da vida ъtil ficar acima de 30MWe e se o tempo de vida ъtil for igual ou maior do que 60 anos. Tal fato decorre dos altos custos de aquisiзгo que requerem uma vida longa para compensar o investimento e dos efeitos de economia de escala especialmente pronunciados para reatores a бgua pressurizada.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: The importance of design methods has been growing in recent years as complex socio-technical systems become more common. In addition to complexity, the size and financial investment of these systems amplifies the severity of design errors. The general goal of this work was to develop a specification and design method that reduces the time and energy to design a complex system whose functions are known a priori, managing the risks in parallel. The specific goal was to verify if small modular reactors could be economically possible. This work adopted as principle the Constructal law, that predicts the success of systems that ease the necessary flows to its existence. After finding the key factors to ease the flow of information, this work developed a set of concepts to ease the engineering work. Applying such concepts, this work developed sequences of activities that describe the proposed method. Lists of requirements gave guidance for each activity. Event tree and fault tree analyses showed the advantages of the proposed method. Using the method, this work developed specifications and designs at many product breakdown levels (enterprise, nuclear power plant, nuclear steam supply system, reactor coolant system and steam generator). Using data from US Navy, this work developed a cost model for small reactors. This work concluded that nuclear power may be competitive if average electrical power extracted during the life is larger than 30 MWe and if life time is superior to 60 years. The first condition is consequence of the high overnight costs of nuclear power. The second is consequence of the strong scale economy effects of pressurized water reactors.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Desenvolvimento de modelos analнtico e numйrico associados ao fenфmeno de condensaзгo por contato direto em tanque de alнvio de reator PWR
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Esse trabalho analisa os modelos disponнveis do fenфmeno da injeзгo de vapor em tanque de alнvio valendo-se para tanto de comparaзхes entre dados experimentais obtidos em experimento de descarga de vapor no tanque de alнvio entre os modelos analнticos disponнveis e entre os resultados obtidos de modelagem numйrica e desenvolve modelo prуprio, de carбter numйrico/analнtico
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES:
The phenomenon of vapor injection in relief tanks presents relevance in the design of light water 
 reactors, be they of the type pressurized water reactor (PWR) or boiling water reactor (BWR). This phenomenon allows the rapid absorption of the vapor injected in a mass of water, by condensation. Since this vapor may contain chemical or radiological contaminants that do not allow its discharge directly in the environment, it must be collected. The condensation avoids the design of devices and equipment, which need to consider the high vapor pressure, and allows the vapor to be collected. The rapidity with which the condensation occurs is the result of physical processes that occur at the interface of steam and water. These processes do not yet have a defined numerical and analytical model. In 1972 a semi-empirical model was proposed, which has, since then, evolved. Nevertheless, up to the present moment, there is no definitive model that intends to cover every extension of the experimental conditions. These models are strongly dependent on the mass flow through the steam and water interface, however, up to date, there is no expression that determines this mass flow. For the sake of this, the value of 275 kg / mІ / s has been assumed as "representative of the order of magnitude of the phenomenon" up to the present moment. In this work, a method of analytical calculation of mass flow is proposed, considering as premise the isotropy of the injection, and the development of the 1st and 2nd laws of thermodynamics. Still, the phenomenon is analyzed experimentally, by means of the analysis of the data produced in the experiment of Loop 150, realized in dependencies of the CENTRO TECNOLУGICO DA MARINHA EM SГO PAULO. Finally, a numerical model in commercial software was developed to complement the analysis. The result is proven with an isentropic mass flow formulation, which satisfactorily corrected the mass used in the former semi-empirical models. Such verification was performed through a series of data and confrontation with experimental data in the literature.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Development of analytical and numerical models associated to the condensation phenomenon by direct contact in PWR reactor relief tank

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Modelagem numйrica de um elemento combustнvel para estudos hidrodinвmicos
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Й visнvel, no mundo atual, a elevada dependкncia da utilizaзгo de energia elйtrica. Na tentativa de suprir as necessidades de consumo e impedir o dйficit energйtico, a sociedade faz uso dos mais diversos artifнcios para a obtenзгo desta. Nesta perspectiva, a utilizaзгo da energia nuclear vem sempre sendo recolocada nos fуruns mundiais de geraзгo elйtrica revelando-se uma alternativa eficiente, limpa e de baixo custo. Devido а complexidade enfrentada durante a instalaзгo de empreendimentos nucleares diversos protocolos, equipamentos e aзхes de seguranзa sгo empregados para garantir a operaзгo segura da planta nuclear ao longo de sua vida ъtil. Reatores de pesquisas prestam suporte no desenvolvimento de novas tecnologias e prбticas de seguranзa, desde que estes tenham seus fenфmenos e comportamentos bem compreendidos como base de partida. O presente trabalho destina-se a criar suporte para a atualizaзгo da anбlise de seguranзa do reator de pesquisa IEA-R1. Testes numйricos foram conduzidos para validar a viabilidade de construзгo de um modelo computacional capaz de apresentar resultados similares aos dados experimentais jб existentes. O trabalho mostra que a distribuiзгo de vazгo no elemento combustнvel ocorre de forma nгo uniforme com os canais laterais recebendo vazхes menores do que os centrais. Os canais perifйricos recebem uma vazгo mйdia de 95% da vazгo principal enquanto os canais centrais recebem atй 105% da vazгo principal. Os resultados sгo ligeiramente diferentes dos resultados experimentais apresentados anteriormente, entretanto apresentam uma boa correlaзгo com outros estudos numйricos em elementos combustнveis similares.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: The world today is the highly dependent on the use of electric energy. To meet the needs of consumption and to prevent deficit, society uses the most various devices to obtain energy. In this perspective, the use of nuclear energy is always being replaced in the world's electric generation forums, proving to be an efficient, clean and low-cost alternative. Due to the complexity faced during the installation of nuclear undertakings several protocols, equipment and safety actions are employed to ensure the safe operation of the nuclear plant throughout its useful life. Researchers support the development of new security technologies and practices, as long as they have their phenomena and behaviors well understood as the starting point. The present work aims to create support for updating the safety analysis of the IEA-R1 research reactor. Numerical tests were conducted to validate the feasibility of constructing a computational model capable of simulating the existing experimental data. It shows that the flow distribution in the fuel element occurs non-uniformly with the lateral channels receiving smaller flows than the central ones. The peripheral channels receive a mean flow rate of 95% of the main flow while the central channels receive up to 105% of the main flow. The results are slightly different from the previous experimental results, however they have a good correlation with other numerical studies on similar fuel elements.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: Numerical modeling of a fuel element for hydrodynamic studies

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Estudo da influкncia da radiaзгo ionizante sobre os nanofluidos visando aplicaзхes em novas geraзхes de reatores nucleares
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Este projeto de pesquisa tem como objetivo investigar as propriedades fнsicas de nanofluidos associadas аs suas capacidades de transporte de calor, tendo em vista a possibilidade de aplicaзгo em reatores nucleares. O projeto consiste em realizar estudos teуricos e experimentais com nanofluidos que resultem no avanзo do conhecimento sobre suas propriedades fнsicas com e sem a aзгo da radiaзгo ionizante. Os nanofluidos а base de уxidos metбlicos Al2O3, TiO2, BeO, ZrO2, reconhecidamente eficientes no processo de transporte de altos fluxos de calor, tкm sido considerados promissores para a utilizaзгo em sistemas de alta tecnologia, mas os seus comportamentos sob a aзгo de radiaзгo ionizante ainda sгo pouco conhecidos. Suas propriedades fнsicas, principalmente a condutividade tйrmica, os classificam como fluidos promissores para aplicaзхes nas futuras geraзхes de reatores nucleares em desenvolvimento. Com o objetivo de melhor compreender os efeitos da radiaзгo ionizante sobre os nanofluidos e sua capacidade de transporte de altos fluxos de calor, serгo feitas anбlises e experimentos para mediзгo de algumas propriedades fнsicas como a condutividade tйrmica, densidade, viscosidade, tensгo superficial e вngulo de contato com a superfнcie antes e depois de irradiadas as amostras. O projeto contarб com a parceria de pesquisadores de outras instituiзхes nacionais que jб possuem conhecimento formado sobre nanofluidos, contribuindo para o desenvolvimento desse conhecimento em вmbito nacional. Os resultados das investigaзхes serгo importantes para o desenvolvimento do conhecimento do comportamento dos nanofluidos sob a aзгo da radiaзгo ionizante, viabilizando, no futuro, suas aplicaзхes em novas geraзхes de reatores nucleares, alйm de contribuir para o desenvolvimento do conhecimento e formaзгo de novos pesquisadores na бrea nuclear e de nanotecnologia no Brasil.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Capacitaзгo Cientнfica, Tecnolуgica e de infraestrutura em Radiofarmбcia e Radiaзхes a Serviзo da Saъde
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: A Capacitaзгo Cientнfica e Tecnolуgica refere-se а adequaзгo necessбria ao desenvolvimento de novos radiofбrmacos, especificamente na fase do ciclo de desenvolvimento correspondente ao deslocamento atй piloto, dentro de padrхes de qualidade exigidos. Considera-se, tambйm, a seguranзa para manipulaзгo de atividades radioativas altas, compatнveis com escala de produзгo industrial, possibilitando fechar o ciclo do desenvolvimento do novo produto com a produзгo de lotes destinados а conduзгo de estudos clнnicos para demonstrar sua eficбcia e seguranзa. Alйm disso, esta capacitaзгo inclui o desenvolvimento de prбticas laboratoriais avanзadas para a qualificaзгo quнmica e isotуpica de radiofбrmacos e nanobiomateriais, para aplicaзгo na saъde, via tйcnica de espectrometria de massas, entre outras. Os radiofбrmacos produzidos no IPEN precisam ser avaliados por testes prй-clнnicos para aprovaзгo junto а ANVISA. Este projeto tambйm tem por finalidade tanto desenvolver pesquisas para avaliar a atividade citotуxica e genotуxica de novos candidatos a radiofбrmacos, como aprimorar os sistemas de detecзгo de radiaзгo e os processos associados а radioterapia, а medicina nuclear e ao radiodiagnуstico, via computaзгo de alto desempenho. Quanto а capacitaзгo em P&D, o projeto objetiva criar no IPEN, de forma inйdita no paнs, um nъcleo de estudos de imagem em molйculas, cйlulas, tecidos e nanopartнculas associadas a processos biolуgicos, com (micro-FTIR), para uso inovador em medicina. As tйcnicas propostas permitirгo mapear mudanзas ultraestruturais e alteraзхes celulares antes e apуs um dado tratamento, seja por laser, nanopartнculas, braquiterapia, ou radiofбrmacos. Numa outra frente de P&D, objetiva-se demonstrar a viabilidade da aceleraзгo de partнculas carregadas (elйtrons/prуtons/hadrons) em sistemas compactos e de mais baixo custo que as tecnologias convencionais de aceleraзгo, usando a protonterapia em medicina nuclear.
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES:
The Scientific and Technological Qualification refers to the necessary adaptation to the development of new radiopharmaceuticals, specifically in the phase of scheduling until pilot, within the required quality standards. In addition, one must consider safety issues for manipulation of high radioactive activities, compatible with the scale of industrial production, making it possible to close the development cycle for new products, destined to conduct clinical studies in order to demonstrate their efficacy and safety. This capacitation includes the development of advanced laboratory practices for the chemical and isotopic qualification of radiopharmaceuticals and nanobiomaterials, for health application, via mass spectrometry technique, among others. Radiopharmaceuticals produced at IPEN need assessment by pre-clinical tests for ANVISA approval. This project also aims to carry out research to evaluate the cytotoxic and genotoxic activity of new radiopharmaceutical candidates, as well as to improve radiation detection systems and the processes associated with radiotherapy, nuclear medicine and radiodiagnosis, using high performance computing.
Considering the qualification in R&D Infrastructure, the project aims to create a nucleus of imaging studies in molecules, cells, tissues and nanoparticles associated to biological processes at IPEN, unprecedented in the country, by micro-FTIR, for innovative use in medicine. The proposed techniques will allow mapping of ultrastructural and cellular changes before and after a given treatment, by either laser, nanoparticules, brachytherapy, or radiopharmaceutical. On another front of R&D, the objective is to demonstrate the feasibility of the acceleration of charged particles (electrons/protons/hadrons) in compact systems with lower cost, compared to conventional technologies of acceleration, aiming to proton therapy for nuclear medicine.

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: ANDRADE, D.A.;ANDRADE, DA;ANDRADE, Delvonei A.;ANDRADE, Delvonei Alves de;D.A. Andrade;de Andrade, Delvonei Alves;Andrade, Dr. Delvonei Alves de;ANDRADE, DELVONEI;ANDRADE, D. A.;DE ANDRADE, DELVONEI A.;DE ANDRADE, D.A.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This research presents the study of the critical flow for a nuclear reactor parallel-plate fuel assembly. The objective of this study is to establish parameters to avoid the collapse of the fuel-plates. RMB, Brazilian Multipurpose Reactor, developed by National Commission of Nuclear Energy is considered. It was developed a project for the construction of a scaled model and a prototype for experimental results and, at the same time, a study with CFD simulations, including mesh studies, model variables such as: smooth, density, temperature of the reactor interior critical section. The results will indicate if the CFD simulation, with the proposed mesh, is in fact a suitable tool for this kind of research.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This research presents the study of the critical flow for a nuclear reactor parallel-plate fuel assembly. The objective of this study is to establish parameters to avoid the collapse of the fuel-plates. RMB, Brazilian Multipurpose Reactor, developed by National Commission of Nuclear Energy is considered. It was developed a project for the construction of a scaled model and a prototype for experimental results and, at the same time, a study with CFD simulations, including mesh studies, model variables such as: smooth, density, temperature of the reactor interior critical section. The results will indicate if the CFD simulation, with the proposed mesh, is in fact a suitable tool for this kind of research.

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: ANDRADE, D.A.;ANDRADE, DA;ANDRADE, Delvonei A.;ANDRADE, Delvonei Alves de;D.A. Andrade;de Andrade, Delvonei Alves;Andrade, Dr. Delvonei Alves de;ANDRADE, DELVONEI;ANDRADE, D. A.;DE ANDRADE, DELVONEI A.;DE ANDRADE, D.A.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This work presents a comparative numerical study between two geometrical arrangements of fins. The proposal is the comparison of conventional geometric solution and a geometric alternative that promotes a more efficient air flow between the fins. The fins are fixed in heated vertical wall. The air flow is given only by the density difference, or by natural convection. The results indicate that the proposed geometry promotes flow near the fins increasing the average coefficient of convective heat transfer.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This work presents a comparative numerical study between two geometrical arrangements of fins. The proposal is the comparison of conventional geometric solution and a geometric alternative that promotes a more efficient air flow between the fins. The fins are fixed in heated vertical wall. The air flow is given only by the density difference, or by natural convection. The results indicate that the proposed geometry promotes flow near the fins increasing the average coefficient of convective heat transfer.

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: ANDRADE, D.A.;ANDRADE, DA;ANDRADE, Delvonei A.;ANDRADE, Delvonei Alves de;D.A. Andrade;de Andrade, Delvonei Alves;Andrade, Dr. Delvonei Alves de;ANDRADE, DELVONEI;ANDRADE, D. A.;DE ANDRADE, DELVONEI A.;DE ANDRADE, D.A.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Among the countless applications presently proposed for the nanofluids, the applications in energy has special attention by academic and industrial interest. Studies demonstrate that nanofluids based on metal oxide nanoparticles have physical properties that characterize themas promising working fluids, mainly, in industrial systems in which high heat flux want to be removed. The nuclear reactors for power productionare examples of industry where such an application has been proposed. However, there are no concrete results on the ionizingradiation effects on nanofluids properties. This work aims to present the initial results of the current study carried out with the objective to check the effects caused by that ionizing radiation on nanofluids based on Al2O3 and ZrO2 nanoparticles.Results from thermophysical analyses demonstrate that particular behavior on thermal conductivity,and density of such nanofluids can be observed as a function of temperature under no ionizing radiation effect. New investigations will analyze the application potentiality of some nanofluids in nuclear systems for heat transfer enhancement under ionizing radiation influence.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Among the countless applications presently proposed for the nanofluids, the applications in energy has special attention by academic and industrial interest. Studies demonstrate that nanofluids based on metal oxide nanoparticles have physical properties that characterize themas promising working fluids, mainly, in industrial systems in which high heat flux want to be removed. The nuclear reactors for power productionare examples of industry where such an application has been proposed. However, there are no concrete results on the ionizingradiation effects on nanofluids properties. This work aims to present the initial results of the current study carried out with the objective to check the effects caused by that ionizing radiation on nanofluids based on Al2O3 and ZrO2 nanoparticles.Results from thermophysical analyses demonstrate that particular behavior on thermal conductivity,and density of such nanofluids can be observed as a function of temperature under no ionizing radiation effect. New investigations will analyze the application potentiality of some nanofluids in nuclear systems for heat transfer enhancement under ionizing radiation influence.

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: ANDRADE, D.A.;ANDRADE, DA;ANDRADE, Delvonei A.;ANDRADE, Delvonei Alves de;D.A. Andrade;de Andrade, Delvonei Alves;Andrade, Dr. Delvonei Alves de;ANDRADE, DELVONEI;ANDRADE, D. A.;DE ANDRADE, DELVONEI A.;DE ANDRADE, D.A.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Previously, an instrumented dummy fuel element (DMPV-01), with the same geometric characteristics of a MTR fuel element, was designed and constructed for pressure drop and flow distribution measurement experiments at the IEA-R1 reactor core. This dummy element was also used to measure the flow distribution among the rectangular flow channels formed by element fuel plates. A CFD numerical model was developed to complement the studies. This work presents the proposed CFD model as well as a comparison between numerical and experimental results of flow rate distribution among the internal flow channels. Numerical results show that the model reproduces the experiments very well and can be used for the studies as a more convenient and complementary tool.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Previously, an instrumented dummy fuel element (DMPV-01), with the same geometric characteristics of a MTR fuel element, was designed and constructed for pressure drop and flow distribution measurement experiments at the IEA-R1 reactor core. DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: A Concept of PWR using plate and shell heat exchagers
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: International Nuclear Atlantic Conference - INAC2015

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: 2015 International Nuclear Atlantic Conference - INAC2015

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: ANDRADE, D.A.;ANDRADE, DA;ANDRADE, Delvonei A.;ANDRADE, Delvonei Alves de;D.A. Andrade;de Andrade, Delvonei Alves;Andrade, Dr. Delvonei Alves de;ANDRADE, DELVONEI;ANDRADE, D. A.;DE ANDRADE, DELVONEI A.;DE ANDRADE, D.A.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: In previous work it was verified the physical possibility of using plate and shell heat exchangers for steam generation in a PWR for merchant ships. This work studies the possibility of using GESMEX commercial of the shelf plate and shell heat exchanger of series XPS. It was found it is feasible for this type of heat exchanger to meet operational and accidental requirements for steam generation in PWR. Additionally, it is proposed an arrangement of such heat exchangers inside the reactor pressure vessel. Such arrangement may avoid ANSI/ANS51.1 nuclear class I requirements on those heat exchangers because they are contained in the reactor coolant pressure barrier and play no role in accidental scenarios. Additionally, those plates work under compression, preventing the risk of rupture. Being considered non-nuclear safety, having a modular architecture and working under compression may turn such architectural choice a must to meet safety objectives with improved economics.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Analysis of experimental routines of high enthalpy steam discharge in subcooled water

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: 2015 International Nuclear Atlantic Conference - INAC2015

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: ANDRADE, D.A.;ANDRADE, DA;ANDRADE, Delvonei A.;ANDRADE, Delvonei Alves de;D.A. Andrade;de Andrade, Delvonei Alves;Andrade, Dr. Delvonei Alves de;ANDRADE, DELVONEI;ANDRADE, D. A.;DE ANDRADE, DELVONEI A.;DE ANDRADE, D.A.

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-3.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Seguranзa, Localizaзгo e Licenciamento de Reatores

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The discharge of high enthalpy steam through safety release valves out from pressurizers in PWRґs needs to be condensed in order to allow the treatment of possibly present radwaste within. The Direct Contact Condensation is used in a relief tank to achieve the condensation. Care must be taken to avoid the bypass of the steam through the subcooled water, what would increase the peak of pressure and the necessity of structural reinforcement of the relief tank. An experiment to determine the optimal set up of the relief tank components and their characteristics (type of sprinkler, level of water, volume of tank, discharge direction, pressure in the pressurizer among others) was executed in 2000, in the CTE 150 facility, in CTMSP. In a total, 144 routines varying its components and characteristics were made, although no comprehensive analysis of its results were yet made, since the mass of data was too big to be readily analyzed. In order to comprehensively analyze it, a VBA program is being made to compile and graphically represent the mass of data. The current state of this program allowed conclusions over the peak pressure, adiabatic assumption of the experiment, and the quality of the steam generated due to the discharge.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The discharge of high enthalpy steam through safety release valves out from pressurizers in PWRґs needs to be condensed in order to allow the treatment of possibly present radwaste within. DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Ant colony optimization and neural networks applied to nuclear power plant monitoring
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Ant colony optimization and neural networks applied to nuclear power plant monitoring

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: 2015 International Nuclear Atlantic Conference - INAC 2015

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: ANDRADE, D.A.;ANDRADE, DA;ANDRADE, Delvonei A.;ANDRADE, Delvonei Alves de;D.A. Andrade;de Andrade, Delvonei Alves;Andrade, Dr. Delvonei Alves de;ANDRADE, DELVONEI;ANDRADE, D. A.;DE ANDRADE, DELVONEI A.;DE ANDRADE, D.A.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A recurring challenge in production processes is the development of monitoring and diagnosis systems. Those systems help on detecting unexpected changes and interruptions, preventing losses and mitigating risks. Artificial Neural Networks (ANNs) have been extensively used in creating monitoring systems. Usually the ANNs created to solve this kind of problem are created by taking into account only parameters as the number of inputs, outputs, and hidden layers. The result networks are generally fully connected and have no improvements in its topology. This work intends to use an Ant Colony Optimization (ACO) algorithm to create a tuned neural network. The ACO search algorithm will use Back Error Propagation (BP) to optimize the network topology by suggesting the best neuron connections. The result ANN will be applied to monitoring the IEA-R1 research reactor at IPEN.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: No Municнpio de Sгo Paulo, particularmente, ocorreu uma crescente mudanзa nas causas de mortalidade. Um panorama a respeito da distribuiзгo e das tendкncias dos tipos de cвncer, em diferentes populaзхes, pode ser obtido a partir de dados dos registros de cвncer; estes sгo sistemas de informaзгo em saъde criados para coletar dados de pacientes com o pressuposto de conhecer a incidкncia dessas neoplasias malignas. Os dados sгo disponibilizados em diferentes bancos de dados, sendo um deles os Registros de Cвncer de Base Populacional (RCBP). Os RCBP contкm informaзхes que possibilitam a descriзгo e o monitoramento do perfil da incidкncia de cвncer em uma populaзгo definida. O RCBP do Municнpio de Sгo Paulo й coordenado pelo Departamento de Epidemiologia da Faculdade de Saъde Pъblica da Universidade de Sгo Paulo; por meio deste banco й possнvel analisar dados das diferentes regiхes do Municнpio. O objetivo deste estudo й fazer um levantamento dos casos de cвncer fatal e nгo fatal ocorridos nas diferentes regiхes do Municнpio de Sгo Paulo (Centro-Oeste, Leste, Norte, Sudeste e Sul), a fim de comparar a ocorrкncia desta doenзa entre as mesmas. Este levantamento servirб para verificar o nъmero de casos de cвncer na regiгo do Municнpio onde estб localizado o Instituto de Pesquisas Energйticas e Nucleares, objetivando mostrar а populaзгo que o trabalho com radiaзгo ionizante й seguro e que a exposiзгo а radiaзгo de fundo desta localidade nгo й capaz de desenvolver algum tipo de cвncer, considerando que existem outros diversos fatores de risco.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Characterization of physical properties of Al2O3 and ZrO2 nanofluids for heat transfer applications
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Characterization of physical properties of Al2O3 and ZrO2 nanofluids for heat transfer applications

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: 2015 International Nuclear Atlantic Conference - INAC2015

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: ANDRADE, D.A.;ANDRADE, DA;ANDRADE, Delvonei A.;ANDRADE, Delvonei Alves de;D.A. Andrade;de Andrade, Delvonei Alves;Andrade, Dr. Delvonei Alves de;ANDRADE, DELVONEI;ANDRADE, D. A.;DE ANDRADE, DELVONEI A.;DE ANDRADE, D.A.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Studies demonstrate that nanofluids based on metal oxide nanoparticles have physical properties that
characterize them as promising fluids, mainly, in industrial systems in which high heat flux takes place. Water
based nanofluids of Al2O3 and ZrO2 were characterized regarding its promising use in heat transfer applications.
Three different concentrations of dispersed solutions of cited nanofluids were prepared (0.01% vol., 0.05% vol.,
and 0.1% vol.) from commercial nanofluids. Experimental measurements were carried out at different
temperatures. Thermal conductivity, viscosity and density of the prepared nanofluids were measured.

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-3.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Seguranзa, Localizaзгo e Licenciamento de Reatores

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The objective of this work is to describe the database being developed at IPEN - CNEN / SP for application in
the Probabilistic Safety Assessment of nuclear research reactors. The database can be accessed by means of a
computational program installed in the corporate computer network, named IPEN Intranet, and this access will
be allowed only to professionals previously registered. Data updating, editing and searching tasks will be
controlled by a system administrator according to IPEN Intranet security rules. The logical model and the
physical structure of the database can be represented by an Entity Relationship Model, which is based on the
operational routines performed by IPEN - CNEN / SP users. The web application designed for the management
of the database is named PSADB. It is being developed with MySQL database software and PHP programming
language is being used. Data stored in this database are divided into modules that refer to technical
specifications, operating history, maintenance history and failure events associated with the main components of
the nuclear facilities.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Gamma stability and powder formation of UMo alloys
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Gamma stability and powder formation of UMo alloys

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: 2015 International Nuclear Atlantic Conference - INAC2015

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: ANDRADE, D.A.;ANDRADE, DA;ANDRADE, Delvonei A.;ANDRADE, Delvonei Alves de;D.A. Andrade;de Andrade, Delvonei Alves;Andrade, Dr. Delvonei Alves de;ANDRADE, DELVONEI;ANDRADE, D. A.;DE ANDRADE, DELVONEI A.;DE ANDRADE, D.A.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
A study of the hydrogen embrittlement as well as a research on the relation between gamma decomposition and powder formation of uranium molybdenum alloys were previously presented. In this study a comparison
regarding the hypo-eutectoid and hyper-eutectoid molybdenum additions is presented. Gamma raniummolybdenum alloys have been considered as the fuel phase in plate type fuel elements for material and test reactors (MTR). Regarding their usage as a dispersion phase in aluminum matrix, it is necessary to convert the as cast structure into powder, and one of the techniques considered for this purpose is the hydration-dehydration (HDH). This paper shows that, under specific conditions of heating and cooling, γ-UMo fragmentation may occur with non-reactive or reactive mechanisms. Following the production of the alloys by induction melting, samples of the alloys were thermally treated under a constant flow of hydrogen. It was observed that, even without a massive hydration-dehydration process, the alloys fragmented under specific conditions of thermal treatment, during the thermal shock phase of the experiments. Also, there is a relation between absorption and the rate of gamma decomposition or the gamma phase stability of the alloy and this phenomenon can be related to the eutectoid transformation temperature. This study was carried out to search for a new method for the production of powders and for the evaluation of important physical parameter such as the eutectoid transformation temperature, as an alternative to the existing ones.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Self-organizing maps applied to two-phase flow on natural circulation loop studies
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Self-organizing maps applied to two-phase flow on natural circulation loop studies

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: 2015 International Nuclear Atlantic Conference - INAC2015

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: ANDRADE, D.A.;ANDRADE, DA;ANDRADE, Delvonei A.;ANDRADE, Delvonei Alves de;D.A. Andrade;de Andrade, Delvonei Alves;Andrade, Dr. Delvonei Alves de;ANDRADE, DELVONEI;ANDRADE, D. A.;DE ANDRADE, DELVONEI A.;DE ANDRADE, D.A.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Two-phase flow of liquid and gas is found in many closed circuits using natural circulation for cooling purposes.
Natural circulation phenomenon is important on recent nuclear power plant projects for heat removal on ?loss of
pump power? or ?plant shutdown? accidents. The accuracy of heat transfer estimation has been improved based
on models that require precise prediction of pattern transitions of flow. Self-Organizing Maps are trained to digital
images acquired on natural circulation flow instabilities. This technique will allow the selection of the more
important characteristics associated with each flow pattern, enabling a better comprehension of each observed
instability. This periodic flow oscillation behavior can be observed thoroughly in this facility due its glass-made
tubes transparency. The Natural Circulation Facility (Circuito de Circulaзгo Natural ? CCN ) installed at Instituto
de Pesquisas Enйrgeticas e Nucleares, IPEN/CNEN, is an experimental circuit designed to provide thermal
hydraulic data related to one and two phase flow under natural circulation conditions.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Simulation of the first step of the coupling of the PARCS/RELAP5 codes to Angra 2 facility
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Simulation of the first step of the coupling of the PARCS/RELAP5 codes to Angra 2 facility

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: 2015 International Nuclear Atlantic Conference - INAC2015

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: ANDRADE, D.A.;ANDRADE, DA;ANDRADE, Delvonei A.;ANDRADE, Delvonei Alves de;D.A. Andrade;de Andrade, Delvonei Alves;Andrade, Dr. Delvonei Alves de;ANDRADE, DELVONEI;ANDRADE, D. A.;DE ANDRADE, DELVONEI A.;DE ANDRADE, D.A.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Since the Three Mile Island (1979) and Chernobyl (1986) accidents, the International Agency of Energy Atomic (IAEA) has worked with the authorities of other countries that use nuclear power plants in order to guarantee the safe of those facilities. The utilities have simulated design basic accidents to verify the integrity of the nuclear power plant to these events. However, after Fukushima accident in Japan (2011), the people have felt insecure and been afraid in relation to nuclear power plants. Today, the international and national organizations, such as the International Agency of Energy Atomic (IAEA) and Comissгo Nacional de Energia Nuclear (CNEN), respectively, have worked very hard to prevent some accidents and transients in nuclear power plants in order to ensure the security of the general population. In case of accidents, as the Rod Ejection Accident (REA), it is very important to do the coupling between neutronic and thermal hydraulic areas of nuclear reactors. To solve this type of problem there is the coupling between PARCS/RELAP5 codes. However, to perform this analysis it is necessary to simulate three steps. The first step is simulating the steady state of one nuclear power plant by using RELAP5 code. The second step is to run the steady state of this reactor using the coupling PARCS/RELAP5, and the final step is simulating the REA of this facility with PARCS/RELAP5 coupling. The aim of this work is to show the results of the first step of this analysis, i.e., by means of simulation the steady state of Angra 2 nuclear power plant using RELAP5 version 3.3. In this case, the modeling from the core was more detailed than in the original version developed some years ago for Angra 2. The results obtained in this work were satisfactory.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Since the Three Mile Island (1979) and Chernobyl (1986) accidents, the International Agency of Energy Atomic (IAEA) has worked with the authorities of other countries that use nuclear power plants in order to guarantee the safe of those facilities. The utilities have simulated design basic accidents to verify the integrity of the nuclear power plant to these events. However, after Fukushima accident in Japan (2011), the people have felt insecure and been afraid in relation to nuclear power plants. Today, the international and national organizations, such as the International Agency of Energy Atomic (IAEA) and Comissгo Nacional de Energia Nuclear (CNEN), respectively, have worked very hard to prevent some accidents and transients in nuclear power plants in order to ensure the security of the general population. In case of accidents, as the Rod Ejection Accident (REA), it is very important to do the coupling between neutronic and thermal hydraulic areas of nuclear reactors. To solve this type of problem there is the coupling between PARCS/RELAP5 codes. However, to perform this analysis it is necessary to simulate three steps. The first step is simulating the steady state of one nuclear power plant by using RELAP5 code. The second step is to run the steady state of this reactor using the coupling PARCS/RELAP5, and the final step is simulating the REA of this facility with PARCS/RELAP5 coupling. The aim of this work is to show the results of the first step of this analysis, i.e., by means of simulation the steady state of Angra 2 nuclear power plant using RELAP5 version 3.3. In this case, the modeling from the core was more detailed than in the original version developed some years ago for Angra 2. The results obtained in this work were satisfactory.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A radioterapia clнnica й de fundamental importвncia para o tratamento de lesхes malignas localizadas na regiгo de cabeзa e pescoзo, contudo, a exposiзгo а irradiaзгo ionizante, pode levar a complicaзхes sistкmicas ou locais durante e apуs o tratamento radioterбpico. Dentre estas complicaзхes locais imediatas, destaca-se na cavidade oral a xerostomia e a consequente cбrie de radiaзгo. A respeito das complicaзхes tardias produzidas pela radioterapia, salientam-se a mucosite e a osteorradionecrose, lesхes dose dependentes, com alto nнvel de incidкncia nas ъltimas dйcadas (1-30%) e de difнcil manejo, embora estas se apresentem apуs tйrmino do tratamento e sob influкncia de fatores locais.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Clinical Radiotherapy is extremely important for the treatment of malignant lesions of the head and neck region, however, exposure to ionizing radiation can lead to systemic or local complications during and after radiation treatment. INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A radioterapia clнnica й de fundamental importвncia para o tratamento de lesхes malignas localizadas na regiгo de cabeзa e pescoзo, porйm, a exposiзгo а irradiaзгo ionizante, pode levar a complicaзхes sistкmicas ou locais durante e apуs o tratamento radioterбpico. Dentre estas complicaзхes locais imediatas, destaca-se na cavidade bucal a xerostomia e a consequente mucosite oral. A respeito das complicaзхes tardias produzidas pela radioterapia, salientam-se a cбrie de irradiaзгo e a osteorradionecrose, lesхes dose dependentes, apresentando esta ъltima um alto nнvel de incidкncia nas ъltimas dйcadas (1-30%) e de difнcil manejo, embora estas se apresentem apуs tйrmino do tratamento e sob influкncia de fatores locais. A metodologia proposta no presente estudo visa analisar o efeito direto da radiaзгo gama apуs irradiaзгo das amostras de esmalte, dentina e osso mandibular, utilizando-se a taxa de dose empregada em pacientes acometidos com cвncer de cabeзa e pescoзo. As amostras foram previamente preparadas e padronizadas alйm de serem polidas, e em seguida realizou-se a anбlise da microdureza de superfнcie Inicial de todos os grupos. Posteriormente, as amostras foram irradiadas sob uma taxa de dose de dois Gy por dia, completando uma dose total de setenta e dois Gy. Finalmente, as amostras foram submetidas а anбlise de dureza apуs irradiaзгo, e а anбlise morfolуgica na Microscopia Eletrфnica de Varredura (MEV). Os dados obtidos foram analisados estatisticamente, com um nнvel de significвncia de 95% (p<0,05%), atravйs do teste paramйtrico de T de student para mйdias relacionadas, encontrando-se um resultado estatisticamente significante (p=0,00) para os quatro grupos de amostras estudadas. A partir dos resultados preliminares estatнsticos, conclui-se que o efeito da radiaзгo gama nos tecidos duros da cavidade bucal foi altamente significante no que diz respeito а microdureza de superfнcie, comprovando-se por anбlise morfolуgica nas imagens obtidas atravйs do MEV.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Clinical Radiotherapy is one of the most important techniques for the treatment of malignant lesions of the head and neck, however, exposure to ionizing radiation can lead to systemic complications or sites during and after radiation treatment. Among these immediate local complications in oral cavity, it stands out the xerostomia and consequent oral mucositis. Regarding late complications produced by radiation, decay of radiation and osteoradionecrosis, both dose-dependent lesions, which mostrate a high level of incidence in recent decades (1-30%) and unwieldy, although these are presented after completion of treatment and under the influence of local factors. The methodology proposed in this study aims to examine the direct effect of gamma radiation after irradiation of enamel , root dentin and jawbone samples, using the dose rate used in patients suffering with head and neck cancer. Samples were prepared in advance and standardized and are polished, and then underwent the analysis of the initial surface microhardness of all groups. Subsequently, the samples were irradiated in a dose of Gy rate of two per day, completing a total dose of seventy-two Gy. Finally, the samples were analyzed for Microhardness surface after irradiation, and morphological analysis in scanning electron microscopy (SEM).The data were analyzed statistically with a significance level of 95% (p <0.05%), through the parametric Student's t-test for related averages, finding a statistically significant result (p = 0.00) for the four groups of samples. From the preliminary statistical results, it is concluded that the effect of gamma radiation on hard tissues of the oral cavity was highly significant with regard to the microhardness of the surface, proving in the morphological analysis on the images obtained by SEM.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: O trabalho apresentado constituiu no desenvolvimento de uma bancada de testes experimentais para a utilizaзгo de tйcnicas de anбlise de vibraзгo induzida em escoamentos visando estudos de interaзгo fluido estrutura em seзхes de testes simulando reatores nucleares com elementos combustнveis tipo placas paralelas usados para reatores de pesquisa. Na montagem da bancada experimental foi utilizado parte da infraestrutura experimental jб existente no laboratуrio de termoidrбulica e acrescentado novos equipamentos como bomba, vбlvulas de controle e passagem, trocador de calor, tubulaзгo de maior resistкncia e diвmetro, alйm de um novo quadro de comando elйtrico, para que a bancada possa atingir condiзхes de vazхes e pressхes mais severas para a seзгo de testes. Para os experimentos foi desenvolvida uma seзгo de testes que simula um elemento combustнvel do tipo placas paralelas com trкs canais de resfriamento. A seзгo foi construida em alumнnio e acrнlico, e estб instrumentada com sensores de deformaзгo ( ?strain-gauges?), sensores piezoresistivos de pressгo, um tubo de pitot e um acelerфmetro piezoelйtrico. As dimensхes da seзгo de testes foram baseadas no projeto do Reator Multipropуsito Brasileiro (RMB) que estб sendo desenvolvido pela Comissгo Nacional de Energia Nuclear- CNEN. A nova bancada experimental estб localizada no Centro de Engenharia Nuclear(CEN) do Instituto de Pesquisas Energйticas e Nucleares(IPEN-CNEN/SP). O estudo do comportamento dinвmico das placas paralelas em elementos combustнveis й de grande importвncia para a seguranзa de reatores nucleares de pesquisa onde o fluxo do fluido de refrigeraзгo pode atingir condiзхes operacionais crнticas (velocidades crнticas), provocando vibraзхes e podendo, em ъltimo caso, levar ao colapso destas placas, bloqueando o canal de refrigeraзгo e implicando em acidente de graves proporзхes. O conhecimento dos limites operacionais dos elementos combustнveis projetados para serem utilizados no reator de pesquisa em desenv
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The work presented consisted in the development of a bench of experimental tests for the use of induced vibration analysis techniques in flows aiming studies of interaction fluid structure in sections of tests simulating nuclear reactors with parallel plate type fuel elements used for research reactors. In the assembly of the experimental bench it was used part of the existing experimental infrastructure in the laboratory of thermohydraulics and added new equipment such as pump, control and passage valves, heat exchanger, tubing of greater resistance and diameter, as well as a new electric control board. So that the bench can reach conditions of flows and pressures more severe for the test section. For the experiments, a test section simulating a fuel element of the parallel plate type with three cooling channels was developed. The section was constructed in aluminum and acrylic, and was instrumented with strain gauges, piezoresistive pressure sensors, a pitot tube and a piezoelectric accelerometer. The dimensions of the test section were based on the Brazilian Multipurpose Reactor (RMB) project being developed by the National Nuclear Energy Commission (CNEN). The new experimental bench is located at the Center for Nuclear Engineering (CEN) of the Nuclear and Energy Research Institute (IPEN-CNEN / SP). The study of the dynamic behavior of parallel plates in fuel elements is of great importance for the safety of nuclear research reactors where the flow of the refrigeration fluid can reach critical operational conditions (critical velocities), provoking vibrations and can, in the last case, lead to the collapse of these plates, blocking the cooling channel and implying an accident of serious proportions. Knowledge of the operational limits of the fuel elements designed to be used in the research reactor in development in Brazil, RMB, requires the performance of tests that can be compared with the criteria required for its operation licensing.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Introduction: Clinicai Radiotherapy is extremely important for the treatment of malignant lesions of the head and neck region, however, exposure to ionizing radiation can lead to systemic or local complications during and after radiation treatment. Among these immediate local complications, it stands out in the oral cavity xerostomia and the consequent decay of radiation. Regarding late complications produced by radiation, oral mucositis and osteoradionecrosis are included, which are considered dose-dependent lesions, with high incidence in recent decades (1-30%) and unwieldy, although these are presented after
completion of treatment and under the influence of local factors.

Methodology: The methodology proposed in this study is to analyze the eнfect of gamma radiation after irradiation of the samples, using the dose rate used in patients suffering with head and neck cвncer. The samples were obtained from human enamel and root dentin; and swine mandibular bone, which were previously polished, and then submitted to the analysis of the initial surface microhardness of ali groups. Subsequently, the samples were irradiated in a dose rate of 2 Gy per day, completing a total dose of 72 Gy. Finally, the samples were submitted to analysis of surface microhardness after irradiation, and
the morphological analysis on the SEM.

Results and discussion: The data were analyzed statistically with a significance levei of 95% (p <0.05%).

Conclusion: From the preliminary results of the surface microhardness of the samples, it was founded a marked loss of hardness in the root dentin, mandibular body and retro-molar region.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
O artigo apresenta simulaзгo numйrica computacional de um escoamento em um canal de seзгo transversal retangular havendo transferкncia de calor entre as paredes e o fluido. O canal representa parte de um trocador de calor de placas de pequeno porte para aplicaзгo em dispositivos eletrфnicos. Foram realizadas simulaзхes em que a geometria do canal recebeu alteraзхes como a adiзгo de geradores de turbulкncia objetivando o aumento da taxa de transferкncia de calor. As alteraзхes consistiram na inclusгo de ranhuras na parede e tambйm a adoзгo de vбrios elementos geradores de turbulкncia na entrada do canal, em um total de quatro tipos geomйtricos distintos. Em uma das geometrias do gerador de turbulкncia, dois parвmetros foram variados e os resultados das simulaзхes comparadas. As simulaзхes computacionais foram realizadas utilizando o software comercial ANSYS CFX®. Os resultados indicaram a intensificaзгo da transferкncia de calor nas geometrias modificadas e tambйm a elevaзгo da perda de carga do escoamento. Й indicada a geometria mais adequada entre as 
propostas apresentadas.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Numerical Simulation of Isothermal Upward Two-phase Flow in a Vertical Tube of Annular Section
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Numerical Simulation of Isothermal Upward Two-phase Flow in a Vertical Tube of Annular Section

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: IV Journeys in Multiphase Flows (JEM 2017)

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: A numerical simulation of a vertical, upward, isothermal two-phase flow of air bubbles and water in an annular channel applying Computational Fluid Dynamics code (CFD) was carried out. The simulation considers an Eulerian frame, with two-fluid model, specific correlations for turbulence model considering the dispersion and bubble induction turbulence. The work intends to assess whether the code represents the physical phenomenon accurately by comparing the simulation results with experimental data obtained from literature. The annular channel adopted has equivalent hydraulic diameter of 19.1 mm, where the outer pipe has an internal diameter of 38.1 mm and inner rod 19.1 mm. To represent this geometry, a three-dimensional mesh was generated with 960000 elements, after a mesh independence study. The void fraction distribution, taken radially to the flow section is the main parameter analyzed besides interfacial area concentration, interfacial gas velocity, diameter and distribution of bubbles.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: A numerical simulation of a vertical, upward, isothermal two-phase flow of air bubbles and water in an annular channel applying Computational Fluid Dynamics code (CFD) was carried out. DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: International Nuclear Atlantic Conference - INAC 2017

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The use and the power of nuclear reactors for research and materials testing is increasing worldwide. That implies the demand for nuclear fuel for this kind of reactors is rising. Thus, the production facilities of this kind of fuel need reliable guidance on how to augment their production in order to meet the increasing demand efficiently, safely and keeping good quality. Focus is given to factories that produce plate type fuel elements loaded with LEU U3Si2-Al fuel, which are typically used in nuclear research reactors. Of the various production routes for this kind of fuel, we chose the route which uses hydrolysis of uranium hexafluoride. Raising the capacity of this kind of plants faces several problems, especially regarding safety against nuclear criticality. Some of these problems are briefly addressed. The new issue of the paper is the application of knowledge from the area of production administration to the fabrication of nuclear fuel for research reactors. A specific method for the increase in production capacity is proposed. That method was tested by means of discrete event simulation. The data were collected from the nuclear fuel factory at IPEN. The results indicated the proposed method achieved its goal as well as ways of raising production capacity in up to 50%.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: Experimental investigation of critical velocity in a parallel plate research reactor fuel assembly
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: Experimental investigation of critical velocity in a parallel plate research reactor fuel assembly

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: International Nuclear Atlantic Conference - INAC 2017

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The fuel elements of a MTR (Material Testing Reactor) type nuclear reactor are mostly composed of aluminum-coated fuel plates containing the core of uranium silica (U3Si2) dispersed in an aluminum matrix. These plates have a thickness of the order of millimeters and are much longer in relation to their thickness. They are arranged in parallel in the assembly of the fuel element to form channels between them a few millimeters in thickness, through which there is a flow of the coolant. This configuration, combined with the need for a flow at high flow rates to ensure the cooling of the fuel element in operation, may create problems of mechanical failure of fuel plate due to the vibration induced by the flow in the channels. In the case of critical velocity excessive permanent deflections of the plates can cause blockage of the flow channel in the reactor core and lead to overheating in the plates. For this study an experimental bench capable of high volume flows and a test section that simulates a plate-like fuel element with three cooling channels were developed. The dimensions of the test section were based on the dimensions of the Fuel Element of the Brazilian Multipurpose Reactor (RMB), whose 
project is being coordinated by the National Commission of Nuclear Energy (CNEN).
The experiments 
performed attained the objective of reaching Miller's critical velocity condition. The critical velocity was 
reached with 14.5 m/s leading to the consequent plastic deformation of the flow channel plates.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO: CFD analysis of blockage length on a partially blocked fuel rod
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DO-TRABALHO-INGLES: CFD analysis of blockage length on a partially blocked fuel rod

DETALHAMENTO-DO-TRABALHO.TITULO-DOS-ANAIS-OU-PROCEEDINGS: International Nuclear Atlantic Conference - INAC 2017

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: In LOCA accidents, fuel rods may balloon by the increasing of pressure difference between fuel rod and core vessel. With the balloon effect, the swelling can partially block the flow channel, affecting the coolability during reflood phase. In order to analyze the influence of blockage length after LOCA events, many numerical simulations using Ansys-CFX code have been done in steady state condition, characterizing the final phase of reflood. Peaks of temperature are observed in the middle of the fuel rod, followd by a temperature drop. This effect is justified by the increasing of heat transfer coefficient, originated from the high turbulence effects. Therefore, this paper considers a radial blockage of 90%, varying just the blockage length. This study observed that, for the same boundary conditions, the longer the blockage length originated after LOCA events, the higher are the central temperatures in the fuel rod.

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-2.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Seguranзa, Localizaзгo e Licenciamento de Reatores

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The acceptance of nuclear energy and the risk perceived by the public are affected by past accidents with large media repercussion, like Chernobyl (Ukraine, 1986) and Fukushima (Japan, 2011), the first one because of its magnitude and the latter for still being fresh on people?s minds (Visschers & Walquist, 2013; Pineda-Solano et al., 2013).
Changing this perception based on shocking accidents can be difficult, but informing the public about nuclear energy and the risks imposed by it to them and to the environment helps reducing the population?s concerns (Koerner, 2014; Visschers & Walquist, 2013; Pineda-Solano et al., 2013).
A strategy to cope with public risk perception and achieve a good level of information and preparedness for emergency is risk communication.
This paper presents the result of a research with the workers of Education, Science and Technology of Angra dos Reis (SECT), Brazil, that attended a course given by State Civil Defense with the support of SECT and ELETRONUCLEAR. The course aims to diffuse the knowledge about nuclear energy generation and the External Emergency Plan of State of Rio de Janeiro for a nuclear emergency in the Nuclear Power Plant Almirante Гlvaro Alberto.

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-3.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Seguranзa, Localizaзгo e Licenciamento de Reatores

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
The malicious use of radioactive material could be devastating, particularly in the case of a nuclear explosive device, it could be unpredictably disruptive resulting in the dispersal of radioactive material, like it was in the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear
Power Plant disaster. Physical Protection System (PPS) plays an important role in ensuring that individuals, organizations and institutions remain vigilant and that sustained measures are taken to prevent and combat the threat of sabotage or of using radioactive material for malicious acts. PPS is an integrated system of people, equipment and procedures used to protect nuclear facilities and radioactive sources against threat, theft or sabotage. In the operator?s perspective, this paper study factors influencing the performance of a PPS in a nuclear facility suggesting ways to increase the system effectiveness. The human factor, the physical and the psychological work environment has a large impact on how personnel perform their work and comply with nuclear security requirements. Apathy and corporatism are two human behaviors that collaborate negatively and make decrease the effectiveness of any PPS. Job satisfaction reduces the probability that personnel will become less reliable and/or obstructive in extreme cases an insider threat. Managers must recognize individual and group needs and the relationship among personnel so that they may motivate personnel by creating a supportive working environment that reduces workplace stress. An effective PPS can result in a significant increase in the effectiveness of the security of radioactive material and associated facilities.

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-2.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Seguranзa, Localizaзгo e Licenciamento de Reatores

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS:
Education and training in all levels, in nuclear security, show up as an important tool to the prevention, detection and response to theft, sabotage, unauthorized access, illegal transfer or other malicious acts involving nuclear material or radioactive substances and associated facilities. The responsibility for establishment, implementation, and maintenance of nuclear security within a State rests entirely with that
State. Appropriate training and education at all levels and in all relevant organizations and facilities can play a major role in this process. In order to achieve this goal it is necessary to establish a systematic and comprehensive program for education and training based on well-established international experience.
